attributes.comment:
DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044

I am writing in regards to the docket listed above and the proposed fee increases
it proposes. I ask that you would not allow the fees to be increased for families
needing USCIS documents in order to adopt internationally. Adoption is very
expensive already and these fee increases may deter families from pursuing
adoption. Additionally, as many adopting families have to do the USCIS process
twice just for one adoption due to the length of the adoption process, each family
will be doubly burdened by these increases.

Thank you,
Patricia Goff
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Patricia Gott
